channel.title: Died from being addicted to his XBOX
channel.description:
I normally always scan over yahoo news when I saw this..
http://uk.news.yahoo.com/xbox-addict-dies-blood-clot-101934363.html
What do you guys think?
I think the guy was an idiot playing for 12hours straight.. Although It may not be the fully cause of his death, sat for that long without breaks is clearly not healthy for anyone.

item.title: Died from being addicted to his XBOX
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:10, topic:407360”]I can’t go 12 minutes without moving and this guy went 12 hours without moving or showing any sign of human emotion…

WHAT A PUSSY[/quote]

No Battlefield 3 for you then. Go back to COD

Read full topic
item.source: Died from being addicted to his XBOX

item.title: Died from being addicted to his XBOX
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:9, topic:407360”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=508644.msg3690296#msg3690296 date=1312076355]
They make this sound like doing that is horrible, its bad for your body yes but all of these things could have been competly avoided by getting a drink of water which you don’t do during a tournament because you can’t go to the bathroom.
[/quote]
You get a drink of water from your bathroom?? eww[/quote]Lol xD I feel bad for some of these kids, I mean its not that hard to go work out.

Read full topic
